    • detach

      public void detach()
      detach component from parent scene or component. don't forget to attach it to a scene or component else it become a zombie component

    • isZombie

      public boolean isZombie()
      a zombie component is a component that has no parent scene or component. (should never append)
      Returns:
      is zombie

    • isRoot

      Is this component a root component true if no parent component or scene is found

      is root
